thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: Rebarules

author: Rebarules
title: Rebarules
text:
I started by ordering something small to see if they would actually send. They came through. I have loved everything I have gotten, and it has been a lot. Just make sure you read the measurements and order the right size. I would also recommend shipping insurance. One shirt I never received and I did not pay for the insurance. It is not much so I would recommend. It is a great site and I get a lot of compliments on all their clothes!
Would recommend!
